If this move hits a target under the effect of Bounce, Fly, Magnet Rise, or Telekinesis, the effect ends. If the target is a Flying type that has not used Roost this turn or a Pokemon with the Levitate Ability, it loses its immunity to Ground-type attacks and the Arena Trap Ability as long as it remains active. ragingbull.desc: If this attack does not miss, the effects of Reflect, Light Screen, and Aurora Veil end for the target's side of the field before damage is calculated. If the user's current form is a Paldean Tauros, this move's type changes to match. Fighting type for Combat Breed, Fire type for Blaze Breed, and Water type for Aqua Breed.
ragingbull.shortDesc: Destroys screens. Type depends on user's form.

buzzybuzz.name: Buzzy Buzz
buzzybuzz.desc: Has a 100% chance to paralyze the foe.

seismictoss.name: Seismic Toss
seismictoss.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the user's level.
seismictoss.shortDesc: Does damage equal to the user's level.

anchorshot.name: Anchor Shot
anchorshot.desc: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field.
anchorshot.shortDesc: Prevents the target from switching out.

throatchop.name: Throat Chop
throatchop.desc: For 2 turns, the target cannot use sound-based moves.
throatchop.shortDesc: For 2 turns, the target cannot use sound moves.

bugbite.name: Bug Bite
bugbite.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, it steals the target's held Berry if it is holding one and eats it immediately, gaining its effects even if the user's item is being ignored. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability.
bugbite.shortDesc: User steals and eats the target's Berry.

takeheart.name: Take Heart
takeheart.desc: The user cures its non-volatile status condition. Raises the user's Special Attack and Special Defense by 1 stage.
takeheart.shortDesc: Cures user's status, raises Sp. Atk, Sp. Def by 1.

dracometeor.name: Draco Meteor
dracometeor.desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
dracometeor.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

terablast.name: Tera Blast
terablast.desc: If the user is Terastallized, this move becomes a physical attack if the user's Attack is greater than its Special Attack, including stat stage changes, and this move's type becomes the same as the user's Tera Type. In addition, if the user's Tera Type is Stellar, this move has 100 power, is super effective against Terastallized targets and neutral against other targets, and lowers the user's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage.
terablast.shortDesc: If Terastallized: Phys. if Atk > SpA, type = Tera.

luminacrash.name: Lumina Crash
luminacrash.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 2 stages.
luminacrash.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 2.

mimic.name: Mimic
mimic.desc: While the user remains active, this move is replaced by the last move used by the target. The copied move has the maximum PP for that move. Fails if the target has not made a move, if the user has Transformed, if the user already knows the move, or if the move is Assist, Behemoth Bash, Behemoth Blade, Belch, Blazing Torque, Celebrate, Chatter, Combat Torque, Copycat, Dynamax Cannon, Hold Hands, Magical Torque, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Noxious Torque, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Struggle, Tera Starstorm, Transform, or Wicked Torque.
mimic.shortDesc: The last move the target used replaces this one.

charm.name: Charm
charm.desc: Lowers the target's Attack by 2 stages.

beakblast.name: Beak Blast
beakblast.desc: If the user is hit by a contact move this turn before it can execute this move, the attacker is burned.
beakblast.shortDesc: Burns on contact with the user before it moves.

firstimpression.name: First Impression
firstimpression.desc: Fails unless it is the user's first turn on the field.
firstimpression.shortDesc: Nearly always goes first. First turn out only.

rockslide.name: Rock Slide
rockslide.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
rockslide.shortDesc: 30% chance to make the foe(s) flinch.

retaliate.name: Retaliate
retaliate.desc: Power doubles if one of the user's party members fainted last turn.
retaliate.shortDesc: Power doubles if an ally fainted last turn.

switcheroo.name: Switcheroo
switcheroo.desc: The user swaps its held item with the target's held item. Fails if either the user or the target is holding a Mail or Z-Crystal, if neither is holding an item, if the user is trying to give or take a Mega Stone to or from the species that can Mega Evolve with it, or if the user is trying to give or take a Blue Orb, a Red Orb, a Griseous Orb, a Plate, a Drive, or a Memory to or from a Kyogre, a Groudon, a Giratina, an Arceus, a Genesect, or a Silvally, respectively. The target is immune to this move if it has the Sticky Hold Ability.
switcheroo.shortDesc: User switches its held item with the target's.

headbutt.name: Headbutt
headbutt.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
headbutt.shortDesc: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

stompingtantrum.name: Stomping Tantrum
stompingtantrum.desc: Power doubles if the user's last move on the previous turn, including moves called by other moves or those used through Instruct, Magic Coat, Snatch, or the Dancer or Magic Bounce Abilities, failed to do any of its normal effects, not including damage from an unsuccessful High Jump Kick, Jump Kick, or Mind Blown, or if the user was prevented from moving by any effect other than recharging or Sky Drop. A move that was blocked by Baneful Bunker, Detect, King's Shield, Protect, Spiky Shield, Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard will not double this move's power, nor will Bounce or Fly ending early due to the effect of Gravity, Smack Down, or Thousand Arrows.
stompingtantrum.shortDesc: Power doubles if the user's last move failed.

makeitrain.name: Make It Rain
makeitrain.desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 1 stage.
makeitrain.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 1. Hits foe(s).

bulletseed.name: Bullet Seed
bulletseed.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.

zippyzap.name: Zippy Zap
zippyzap.desc: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's evasion by 1 stage.
zippyzap.shortDesc: Goes first. Raises user's evasion by 1.

grasspledge.name: Grass Pledge
grasspledge.desc: If one of the user's allies chose to use Fire Pledge or Water Pledge this turn and has not moved yet, it takes its turn immediately after the user and the user's move does nothing. If combined with Fire Pledge, the ally uses Fire Pledge with 150 power and a sea of fire appears on the target's side for 4 turns, which causes damage to non-Fire types equal to 1/8 of their maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect, including the last turn. If combined with Water Pledge, the ally uses Grass Pledge with 150 power and a swamp appears on the target's side for 4 turns, which quarters the Speed of each Pokemon on that side. When used as a combined move, this move gains STAB no matter what the user's type is. This move does not consume the user's Grass Gem.
grasspledge.shortDesc: Use with Fire or Water Pledge for added effect.

snowscape.name: Snowscape
snowscape.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Snow. During the effect, the Defense of Ice-type Pokemon is multiplied by 1.5 when taking damage from a physical attack. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Icy Rock. Fails if the current weather is Snow.
snowscape.shortDesc: For 5 turns, snow falls. Ice: 1.5x Def.

tripleaxel.name: Triple Axel
tripleaxel.desc: Hits three times. Power increases to 40 for the second hit and 60 for the third. This move checks accuracy for each hit, and the attack ends if the target avoids a hit. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit three times.
tripleaxel.shortDesc: Hits 3 times. Each hit can miss, but power rises.

kingsshield.name: King's Shield
kingsshield.desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn, and Pokemon trying to make contact with the user have their Attack lowered by 1 stage. Non-damaging moves go through this protection. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Burning Bulwark, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
kingsshield.shortDesc: Protects from damaging attacks. Contact: -1 Atk.

pinmissile.name: Pin Missile
pinmissile.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.

softboiled.name: Soft-Boiled
softboiled.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
softboiled.shortDesc: Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.

dragonascent.name: Dragon Ascent
dragonascent.desc: Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage.
dragonascent.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def by 1.

whirlpool.name: Whirlpool
whirlpool.desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Shed Tail, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
whirlpool.shortDesc: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

spiritshackle.name: Spirit Shackle
spiritshackle.desc: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field.
spiritshackle.shortDesc: Prevents the target from switching out.

fusionflare.name: Fusion Flare
fusionflare.desc: Power doubles if the last move used by any Pokemon this turn was Fusion Bolt.
fusionflare.shortDesc: Power doubles if used after Fusion Bolt this turn.

ruination.name: Ruination
ruination.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to half of its current HP, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.
ruination.shortDesc: Does damage equal to 1/2 target's current HP.

secretsword.name: Secret Sword
secretsword.desc: Deals damage to the target based on its Defense instead of Special Defense.
secretsword.shortDesc: Damages target based on Defense, not Sp. Def.

agility.name: Agility
agility.desc: Raises the user's Speed by 2 stages.

petalblizzard.name: Petal Blizzard
petalblizzard.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent Pokemon.

torchsong.name: Torch Song
torchsong.desc: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by 1 stage.
torchsong.shortDesc: 100% chance to raise the user's Sp. Atk by 1.

rockpolish.name: Rock Polish
rockpolish.desc: Raises the user's Speed by 2 stages.

fakeout.name: Fake Out
fakeout.desc: Has a 100% chance to make the target flinch. Fails unless it is the user's first turn on the field.
fakeout.shortDesc: Hits first. First turn out only. 100% flinch chance.

strangesteam.name: Strange Steam
strangesteam.desc: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.

pounce.name: Pounce
pounce.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
pounce.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1.

esperwing.name: Esper Wing
esperwing.desc: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1 stage and a higher chance for a critical hit.
esperwing.shortDesc: 100% chance to raise user Speed by 1. High crit.

crushclaw.name: Crush Claw
crushclaw.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
crushclaw.shortDesc: 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

return.name: Return
return.desc: Power is equal to the greater of (user's Happiness * 2/5), rounded down, or 1.

clangingscales.name: Clanging Scales
clangingscales.desc: Lowers the user's Defense by 1 stage.

bittermalice.name: Bitter Malice
bittermalice.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1 stage.
bittermalice.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1.

poweruppunch.name: Power-Up Punch
poweruppunch.desc: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1 stage.
poweruppunch.shortDesc: 100% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1.

dragontail.name: Dragon Tail
dragontail.desc: If both the user and the target have not fainted, the target is forced to switch out and be replaced with a random unfainted ally. This effect fails if the target used Ingrain previously, has the Suction Cups Ability, or this move hit a substitute.
dragontail.shortDesc: Forces the target to switch to a random ally.

magmastorm.name: Magma Storm
magmastorm.desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Shed Tail, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
magmastorm.shortDesc: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

thunder.name: Thunder
thunder.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. This move can hit a target using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop, or is under the effect of Sky Drop. If the weather is Primordial Sea or Rain Dance, this move does not check accuracy. If the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, this move's accuracy is 50%. If this move is used against a Pokemon holding Utility Umbrella, this move's accuracy remains at 70%.
thunder.shortDesc: 30% chance to paralyze. Can't miss in rain.

circlethrow.name: Circle Throw
circlethrow.desc: If both the user and the target have not fainted, the target is forced to switch out and be replaced with a random unfainted ally. This effect fails if the target is under the effect of Ingrain, has the Suction Cups Ability, or this move hit a substitute.
circlethrow.shortDesc: Forces the target to switch to a random ally.

sacredsword.name: Sacred Sword
sacredsword.desc: Ignores the target's stat stage changes, including evasiveness.
sacredsword.shortDesc: Ignores the target's stat stage changes.

batonpass.name: Baton Pass
batonpass.desc: The user is replaced with another Pokemon in its party. The selected Pokemon has the user's stat stage changes, confusion, and certain move effects transferred to it.
batonpass.shortDesc: User switches, passing stat changes and more.

nuzzle.name: Nuzzle
nuzzle.desc: Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target.

focusblast.name: Focus Blast
focusblast.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
focusblast.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

triplearrows.name: Triple Arrows
triplearrows.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage, a 30% chance to make it flinch, and a higher chance for a critical hit.

sleeptalk.name: Sleep Talk
sleeptalk.desc: One of the user's known moves, besides this move, is selected for use at random. Fails if the user is not asleep. The selected move does not have PP deducted from it, and can currently have 0 PP. This move cannot select Assist, Beak Blast, Belch, Bide, Blazing Torque, Celebrate, Chatter, Combat Torque, Copycat, Dynamax Cannon, Focus Punch, Hold Hands, Magical Torque, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Noxious Torque, Shell Trap, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Struggle, Uproar, Wicked Torque, or any two-turn move.
sleeptalk.shortDesc: User must be asleep. Uses another known move.

confuseray.name: Confuse Ray
confuseray.desc: Causes the target to become confused.

flipturn.name: Flip Turn
flipturn.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the user switches out even if it is trapped and is replaced immediately by a selected party member. The user does not switch out if there are no unfainted party members, or if the target switched out using an Eject Button or through the effect of the Emergency Exit or Wimp Out Abilities.
flipturn.shortDesc: User switches out after damaging the target.

milkdrink.name: Milk Drink
milkdrink.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
milkdrink.shortDesc: Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.

darkpulse.name: Dark Pulse
darkpulse.desc: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.
darkpulse.shortDesc: 20% chance to make the target flinch.

electrodrift.name: Electro Drift
electrodrift.desc: Damage is multiplied by 1.3333 if this move is super effective against the target.

avalanche.name: Avalanche
avalanche.desc: Power doubles if the user was hit by the target this turn.
avalanche.shortDesc: Power doubles if user is damaged by the target.

futuresight.name: Future Sight
futuresight.desc: Deals damage two turns after this move is used. At the end of that turn, the damage is calculated at that time and dealt to the Pokemon at the position the target had when the move was used. If the user is no longer active at the time, damage is calculated based on the user's natural Special Attack stat, types, and level, with no boosts from its held item or Ability. Fails if this move or Doom Desire is already in effect for the target's position.
futuresight.shortDesc: Hits two turns after being used.

firefang.name: Fire Fang
firefang.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target and a 10% chance to make it flinch.
firefang.shortDesc: 10% chance to burn. 10% chance to flinch.

stomp.name: Stomp
stomp.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.
stomp.shortDesc: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

ivycudgel.name: Ivy Cudgel
ivycudgel.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit. If the user is an Ogerpon holding a mask, this move's type changes to match. Water type for Wellspring Mask, Fire type for Hearthflame Mask, and Rock type for Cornerstone Mask.
ivycudgel.shortDesc: High critical hit ratio. Type depends on user's form.

voltswitch.name: Volt Switch
voltswitch.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the user switches out even if it is trapped and is replaced immediately by a selected party member. The user does not switch out if there are no unfainted party members, or if the target switched out using an Eject Button or through the effect of the Emergency Exit or Wimp Out Abilities.
voltswitch.shortDesc: User switches out after damaging the target.

ceaselessedge.name: Ceaseless Edge
ceaselessedge.desc: If this move is successful, it sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, damaging each opposing Pokemon that switches in, unless it is a Flying-type Pokemon or has the Levitate Ability. A maximum of three layers may be set, and opponents lose 1/8 of their maximum HP with one layer, 1/6 of their maximum HP with two layers, and 1/4 of their maximum HP with three layers, all rounded down. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Defog successfully, or is hit by Defog.
ceaselessedge.shortDesc: Sets a layer of Spikes on the opposing side.

shadowball.name: Shadow Ball
shadowball.desc: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
shadowball.shortDesc: 20% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

synthesis.name: Synthesis
synthesis.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP if Delta Stream or no weather conditions are in effect or if the user is holding Utility Umbrella, 2/3 of its maximum HP if the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, and 1/4 of its maximum HP if the weather is Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, Sandstorm, or Snow, all rounded half down.
synthesis.shortDesc: Heals the user by a weather-dependent amount.

strengthsap.name: Strength Sap
strengthsap.desc: Lowers the target's Attack by 1 stage. The user restores its HP equal to the target's Attack stat calculated with its stat stage before this move was used. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down. Fails if the target's Attack stat stage is -6.
strengthsap.shortDesc: User heals HP=target's Atk stat. Lowers Atk by 1.

stoneaxe.name: Stone Axe
stoneaxe.desc: If this move is successful, it sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, damaging each opposing Pokemon that switches in. Foes lose 1/32, 1/16, 1/8, 1/4, or 1/2 of their maximum HP, rounded down, based on their weakness to the Rock type; 0.25x, 0.5x, neutral, 2x, or 4x, respectively. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Defog successfully, or is hit by Defog.
stoneaxe.shortDesc: Sets Stealth Rock on the target's side.

geomancy.name: Geomancy
geomancy.desc: Raises the user's Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 2 stages. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
geomancy.shortDesc: Charges, then raises SpA, SpD, Spe by 2 turn 2.

moongeistbeam.name: Moongeist Beam
moongeistbeam.desc: This move and its effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.
moongeistbeam.shortDesc: Ignores the Abilities of other Pokemon.

armorcannon.name: Armor Cannon
armorcannon.desc: Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage.
armorcannon.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def by 1.

dragondarts.name: Dragon Darts
dragondarts.desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit. In Double Battles, this move attempts to hit the targeted Pokemon and its ally once each. If hitting one of these Pokemon would be prevented by immunity, protection, semi-invulnerability, an Ability, or accuracy, it attempts to hit the other Pokemon twice instead. If this move is redirected, it hits that target twice.
dragondarts.shortDesc: Hits twice. Doubles: Tries to hit each foe once.

malignantchain.name: Malignant Chain
malignantchain.desc: Has a 50% chance to badly poison the target.
malignantchain.shortDesc: 50% chance to badly poison the target.

slash.name: Slash
slash.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

rapidspin.name: Rapid Spin
rapidspin.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the effects of Leech Seed and binding moves end for the user, and all hazards are removed from the user's side of the field. Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1 stage.
rapidspin.shortDesc: Free user from hazards/bind/Leech Seed; +1 Spe.

calmmind.name: Calm Mind
calmmind.desc: Raises the user's Special Attack and Special Defense by 1 stage.
calmmind.shortDesc: Raises the user's Sp. Atk and Sp. Def by 1.

acrobatics.name: Acrobatics
acrobatics.desc: Power doubles if the user has no held item.
acrobatics.shortDesc: Power doubles if the user has no held item.

volttackle.name: Volt Tackle
volttackle.desc: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target. If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.
volttackle.shortDesc: Has 33% recoil. 10% chance to paralyze target.

expandingforce.name: Expanding Force
expandingforce.desc: If the current terrain is Psychic Terrain and the user is grounded, this move hits all opposing Pokemon and has its power multiplied by 1.5.
expandingforce.shortDesc: User on Psychic Terrain: 1.5x power, hits foes.

collisioncourse.name: Collision Course
collisioncourse.desc: Damage is multiplied by 1.3333 if this move is super effective against the target.

heavyslam.name: Heavy Slam
heavyslam.desc: The power of this move depends on (user's weight / target's weight), rounded down. Power is equal to 120 if the result is 5 or more, 100 if 4, 80 if 3, 60 if 2, and 40 if 1 or less. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.
heavyslam.shortDesc: More power the heavier the user than the target.

dazzlinggleam.name: Dazzling Gleam
dazzlinggleam.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.

superfang.name: Super Fang
superfang.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to half of its current HP, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.
superfang.shortDesc: Does damage equal to 1/2 target's current HP.

tailwind.name: Tailwind
tailwind.desc: For 4 turns, the user and its party members have their Speed doubled. Fails if this move is already in effect for the user's side.
tailwind.shortDesc: For 4 turns, allies' Speed is doubled.

spore.name: Spore
spore.desc: Causes the target to fall asleep.
spore.shortDesc: Causes the target to fall asleep.

aurasphere.name: Aura Sphere
aurasphere.desc: This move does not check accuracy.
aurasphere.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.

discharge.name: Discharge
discharge.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

yawn.name: Yawn
yawn.desc: Causes the target to fall asleep at the end of the next turn. Fails when used if the target cannot fall asleep or if it already has a non-volatile status condition. At the end of the next turn, if the target is still active, does not have a non-volatile status condition, and can fall asleep, it falls asleep. If the target becomes affected, this effect cannot be prevented by Safeguard or a substitute, or by falling asleep and waking up during the effect.
yawn.shortDesc: Puts the target to sleep after 1 turn.

signalbeam.name: Signal Beam
signalbeam.desc: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.

zingzap.name: Zing Zap
zingzap.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
zingzap.shortDesc: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

psychicfangs.name: Psychic Fangs
psychicfangs.desc: If this attack does not miss, the effects of Reflect, Light Screen, and Aurora Veil end for the target's side of the field before damage is calculated.
psychicfangs.shortDesc: Destroys screens, unless the target is immune.

saltcure.name: Salt Cure
saltcure.desc: Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/4 if the target is Steel or Water type), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. This effect ends when the target is no longer active.
saltcure.shortDesc: Deals 1/8 max HP each turn; 1/4 on Steel, Water.

spikyshield.name: Spiky Shield
spikyshield.desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn, and Pokemon making contact with the user lose 1/8 of their maximum HP, rounded down. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Burning Bulwark, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
spikyshield.shortDesc: Protects from moves. Contact: loses 1/8 max HP.

toxicspikes.name: Toxic Spikes
toxicspikes.desc: Sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, poisoning each opposing Pokemon that switches in, unless it is a Flying-type Pokemon or has the Levitate Ability. Can be used up to two times before failing. Opposing Pokemon become poisoned with one layer and badly poisoned with two layers. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Defog successfully, is hit by Defog, or a grounded Poison-type Pokemon switches in. Safeguard prevents the opposing party from being poisoned on switch-in, but a substitute does not.
toxicspikes.shortDesc: Poisons grounded foes on switch-in. Max 2 layers.

grassknot.name: Grass Knot
grassknot.desc: This move's power is 20 if the target weighs less than 10 kg, 40 if less than 25 kg, 60 if less than 50 kg, 80 if less than 100 kg, 100 if less than 200 kg, and 120 if greater than or equal to 200 kg.
grassknot.shortDesc: More power the heavier the target.

doubleironbash.name: Double Iron Bash
doubleironbash.desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
doubleironbash.shortDesc: Hits twice. 30% chance to make the target flinch.

vcreate.name: V-create
vcreate.desc: Lowers the user's Speed, Defense, and Special Defense by 1 stage.
vcreate.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Defense, Sp. Def, Speed by 1.

highjumpkick.name: High Jump Kick
highjumpkick.desc: If this attack is not successful, the user loses half of its maximum HP, rounded down, as crash damage. Pokemon with the Magic Guard Ability are unaffected by crash damage.
highjumpkick.shortDesc: User is hurt by 50% of its max HP if it misses.

populationbomb.name: Population Bomb
populationbomb.desc: Hits ten times. This move checks accuracy for each hit, and the attack ends if the target avoids a hit. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit ten times. If the user is holding Loaded Dice, this move hits four to ten times at random without checking accuracy between hits.
populationbomb.shortDesc: Hits 10 times. Each hit can miss.

fishiousrend.name: Fishious Rend
fishiousrend.desc: Power doubles if the user moves before the target.
fishiousrend.shortDesc: Power doubles if user moves before the target.

sizzlyslide.name: Sizzly Slide
sizzlyslide.desc: Has a 100% chance to burn the foe.

temperflare.name: Temper Flare
temperflare.desc: Power doubles if the user's last move on the previous turn, including moves called by other moves or those used through Instruct, Magic Coat, Snatch, or the Dancer or Magic Bounce Abilities, failed to do any of its normal effects, not including damage from an unsuccessful High Jump Kick, Jump Kick, or Mind Blown, or if the user was prevented from moving by any effect other than recharging or Sky Drop. A move that was blocked by Baneful Bunker, Detect, King's Shield, Protect, Spiky Shield, Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard will not double this move's power, nor will Bounce or Fly ending early due to the effect of Gravity, Smack Down, or Thousand Arrows.
temperflare.shortDesc: Power doubles if the user's last move failed.

petaldance.name: Petal Dance
petaldance.desc: The user spends two or three turns locked into this move and becomes confused immediately after its move on the last turn of the effect if it is not already. This move targets an opposing Pokemon at random on each turn. If the user is prevented from moving, is asleep at the beginning of a turn, or the attack is not successful against the target on the first turn of the effect or the second turn of a three-turn effect, the effect ends without causing confusion. If this move is called by Sleep Talk and the user is asleep, the move is used for one turn and does not confuse the user.
petaldance.shortDesc: Lasts 2-3 turns. Confuses the user afterwards.

meteormash.name: Meteor Mash
meteormash.desc: Has a 20% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1 stage.
meteormash.shortDesc: 20% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1.

trailblaze.name: Trailblaze
trailblaze.desc: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1 stage.
trailblaze.shortDesc: 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1.

airslash.name: Air Slash
airslash.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
airslash.shortDesc: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

firepunch.name: Fire Punch
firepunch.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

rockblast.name: Rock Blast
rockblast.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.

chatter.name: Chatter
chatter.desc: Has a 100% chance to confuse the target.

freezedry.name: Freeze-Dry
freezedry.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target. This move's type effectiveness against Water is changed to be super effective no matter what this move's type is.
freezedry.shortDesc: 10% chance to freeze. Super effective on Water.

spiritbreak.name: Spirit Break
spiritbreak.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.
spiritbreak.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Sp. Atk by 1.

psyblade.name: Psyblade
psyblade.desc: If the current terrain is Electric Terrain, this move's power is multiplied by 1.5.

leer.name: Leer
leer.desc: Lowers the target's Defense by 1 stage.

morningsun.name: Morning Sun
morningsun.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP if Delta Stream or no weather conditions are in effect or if the user is holding Utility Umbrella, 2/3 of its maximum HP if the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, and 1/4 of its maximum HP if the weather is Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, Sandstorm, or Snow, all rounded half down.
morningsun.shortDesc: Heals the user by a weather-dependent amount.

poisonfang.name: Poison Fang
poisonfang.desc: Has a 50% chance to badly poison the target.
poisonfang.shortDesc: 50% chance to badly poison the target.

woodhammer.name: Wood Hammer
woodhammer.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

whirlwind.name: Whirlwind
whirlwind.desc: The target is forced to switch out and be replaced with a random unfainted ally. Fails if the target is the last unfainted Pokemon in its party, or if the target used Ingrain previously or has the Suction Cups Ability.
whirlwind.shortDesc: Forces the target to switch to a random ally.

bodypress.name: Body Press
bodypress.desc: Damage is calculated using the user's Defense stat as its Attack, including stat stage changes. Other effects that modify the Attack stat are used as normal.
bodypress.shortDesc: Uses user's Def stat as Atk in damage calculation.

crabhammer.name: Crabhammer
crabhammer.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

closecombat.name: Close Combat
closecombat.desc: Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage.
closecombat.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def by 1.

glaciallance.name: Glacial Lance
glaciallance.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.

doubleshock.name: Double Shock
doubleshock.desc: Fails unless the user is an Electric type. If this move is successful and the user is not Terastallized, the user's Electric type becomes typeless as long as it remains active.
doubleshock.shortDesc: User's Electric type: typeless; must be Electric.

freezingglare.name: Freezing Glare
freezingglare.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

blizzard.name: Blizzard
blizzard.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target. If the weather is Snow, this move does not check accuracy.
blizzard.shortDesc: 10% chance to freeze foe(s). Can't miss in Snow.

bouncybubble.name: Bouncy Bubble
bouncybubble.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
bouncybubble.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

poltergeist.name: Poltergeist
poltergeist.desc: Fails if the target has no held item.
poltergeist.shortDesc: Fails if the target has no held item.

flamethrower.name: Flamethrower
flamethrower.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

pyroball.name: Pyro Ball
pyroball.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
pyroball.shortDesc: 10% chance to burn the target. Thaws user.

substitute.name: Substitute
substitute.desc: The user takes 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, and puts it into a substitute to take its place in battle. The substitute is removed once enough damage is inflicted on it, or if the user switches out or faints. Baton Pass can be used to transfer the substitute to an ally, and the substitute will keep its remaining HP. Until the substitute is broken, it receives damage from all attacks made by other Pokemon and shields the user from status effects and stat stage changes caused by other Pokemon. Sound-based moves and Pokemon with the Infiltrator Ability ignore substitutes. The user still takes normal damage from weather and status effects while behind its substitute. If the substitute breaks during a multi-hit attack, the user will take damage from any remaining hits. If a substitute is created while the user is trapped by a binding move, the binding effect ends immediately. Fails if the user does not have enough HP remaining to create a substitute without fainting, or if it already has a substitute.
substitute.shortDesc: User takes 1/4 its max HP to put in a substitute.

outrage.name: Outrage
outrage.desc: The user spends two or three turns locked into this move and becomes confused immediately after its move on the last turn of the effect if it is not already. This move targets an opposing Pokemon at random on each turn. If the user is prevented from moving, is asleep at the beginning of a turn, or the attack is not successful against the target on the first turn of the effect or the second turn of a three-turn effect, the effect ends without causing confusion. If this move is called by Sleep Talk and the user is asleep, the move is used for one turn and does not confuse the user.
outrage.shortDesc: Lasts 2-3 turns. Confuses the user afterwards.

aquastep.name: Aqua Step
aquastep.desc: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1 stage.
aquastep.shortDesc: 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1.

sunnyday.name: Sunny Day
sunnyday.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Sunny Day. The damage of Fire-type attacks is multiplied by 1.5 and the damage of Water-type attacks is multiplied by 0.5 during the effect. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Heat Rock. Fails if the current weather is Sunny Day.
sunnyday.shortDesc: For 5 turns, intense sunlight powers Fire moves.

sludgebomb.name: Sludge Bomb
sludgebomb.desc: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

suckerpunch.name: Sucker Punch
suckerpunch.desc: Fails if the target did not select a physical attack, special attack, or Me First for use this turn, or if the target moves before the user.
suckerpunch.shortDesc: Usually goes first. Fails if target is not attacking.

boomburst.name: Boomburst
boomburst.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent Pokemon.

leafstorm.name: Leaf Storm
leafstorm.desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
leafstorm.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

psychicnoise.name: Psychic Noise
psychicnoise.desc: For 2 turns, the target is prevented from restoring any HP as long as it remains active. During the effect, healing and draining moves are unusable, and Abilities and items that grant healing will not heal the user. If an affected Pokemon uses Baton Pass, the replacement will remain unable to restore its HP. Pain Split and the Regenerator Ability are unaffected.
psychicnoise.shortDesc: For 2 turns, the target is prevented from healing.

swordsdance.name: Swords Dance
swordsdance.desc: Raises the user's Attack by 2 stages.

tailslap.name: Tail Slap
tailslap.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.

razorleaf.name: Razor Leaf
razorleaf.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

lavaplume.name: Lava Plume
lavaplume.desc: Has a 30% chance to burn the target.

astralbarrage.name: Astral Barrage
astralbarrage.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.

nightslash.name: Night Slash
nightslash.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

hyperbeam.name: Hyper Beam
hyperbeam.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.

superpower.name: Superpower
superpower.desc: Lowers the user's Attack and Defense by 1 stage.
superpower.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Attack and Defense by 1.

blazekick.name: Blaze Kick
blazekick.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target and a higher chance for a critical hit.
blazekick.shortDesc: High critical hit ratio. 10% chance to burn.

trickroom.name: Trick Room
trickroom.desc: For 5 turns, the Speed of every Pokemon is recalculated for the purposes of determining turn order. During the effect, each Pokemon's Speed is considered to be (10000 - its normal Speed), and if this value is greater than 8191, 8192 is subtracted from it. If this move is used during the effect, the effect ends.
trickroom.shortDesc: Goes last. For 5 turns, turn order is reversed.

scorchingsands.name: Scorching Sands
scorchingsands.desc: Has a 30% chance to burn the target. The target thaws out if it is frozen.
scorchingsands.shortDesc: 30% chance to burn the target. Thaws target.

counter.name: Counter
counter.desc: Deals damage to the last opposing Pokemon to hit the user with a physical attack this turn equal to twice the HP lost by the user from that attack. If the user did not lose HP from the attack, this move deals 1 HP of damage instead. If that opposing Pokemon's position is no longer in use and there is another opposing Pokemon on the field, the damage is done to it instead. Only the last hit of a multi-hit attack is counted. Fails if the user was not hit by an opposing Pokemon's physical attack this turn.
counter.shortDesc: If hit by physical attack, returns double damage.

sing.name: Sing
sing.desc: Causes the target to fall asleep.
sing.shortDesc: Causes the target to fall asleep.

surf.name: Surf
surf.desc: Damage doubles if the target is using Dive.
surf.shortDesc: Hits adjacent Pokemon. Double damage on Dive.

shiftgear.name: Shift Gear
shiftgear.desc: Raises the user's Speed by 2 stages and its Attack by 1 stage.
shiftgear.shortDesc: Raises the user's Speed by 2 and Attack by 1.

aurawheel.name: Aura Wheel
aurawheel.desc: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1 stage. If the user is a Morpeko in Full Belly Mode, this move is Electric type. If the user is a Morpeko in Hangry Mode, this move is Dark type. This move cannot be used successfully unless the user's current form, while considering Transform, is Full Belly or Hangry Mode Morpeko.

mirrorcoat.name: Mirror Coat
mirrorcoat.desc: Deals damage to the last opposing Pokemon to hit the user with a special attack this turn equal to twice the HP lost by the user from that attack. If the user did not lose HP from the attack, this move deals 1 HP of damage instead. If that opposing Pokemon's position is no longer in use and there is another opposing Pokemon on the field, the damage is done to it instead. Only the last hit of a multi-hit attack is counted. Fails if the user was not hit by an opposing Pokemon's special attack this turn.
mirrorcoat.shortDesc: If hit by special attack, returns double damage.

hyperspacefury.name: Hyperspace Fury
hyperspacefury.desc: Lowers the user's Defense by 1 stage. This move cannot be used successfully unless the user's current form, while considering Transform, is Hoopa Unbound. If this move is successful, it breaks through the target's Baneful Bunker, Detect, King's Shield, Protect, or Spiky Shield for this turn, allowing other Pokemon to attack the target normally. If the target's side is protected by Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard, that protection is also broken for this turn and other Pokemon may attack the target's side normally.
hyperspacefury.shortDesc: Hoopa-U: Lowers user's Def by 1; breaks protect.

supercellslam.name: Supercell Slam
supercellslam.desc: If this attack is not successful, the user loses half of its maximum HP, rounded down, as crash damage. Pokemon with the Magic Guard Ability are unaffected by crash damage.
supercellslam.shortDesc: User is hurt by 50% of its max HP if it misses.

gigadrain.name: Giga Drain
gigadrain.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
gigadrain.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

dragondance.name: Dragon Dance
dragondance.desc: Raises the user's Attack and Speed by 1 stage.
dragondance.shortDesc: Raises the user's Attack and Speed by 1.

stickyweb.name: Sticky Web
stickyweb.desc: Sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, lowering the Speed by 1 stage of each opposing Pokemon that switches in, unless it is a Flying-type Pokemon or has the Levitate Ability. Fails if the effect is already active on the opposing side. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Defog successfully, or is hit by Defog.
stickyweb.shortDesc: Lowers Speed of grounded foes by 1 on switch-in.

hurricane.name: Hurricane
hurricane.desc: Has a 30% chance to confuse the target. This move can hit a target using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop, or is under the effect of Sky Drop. If the weather is Primordial Sea or Rain Dance, this move does not check accuracy. If the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, this move's accuracy is 50%. If this move is used against a Pokemon holding Utility Umbrella, this move's accuracy remains at 70%.
hurricane.shortDesc: 30% chance to confuse target. Can't miss in rain.

trick.name: Trick
trick.desc: The user swaps its held item with the target's held item. Fails if either the user or the target is holding a Mail or Z-Crystal, if neither is holding an item, if the user is trying to give or take a Mega Stone to or from the species that can Mega Evolve with it, or if the user is trying to give or take a Blue Orb, a Red Orb, a Griseous Orb, a Plate, a Drive, or a Memory to or from a Kyogre, a Groudon, a Giratina, an Arceus, a Genesect, or a Silvally, respectively. The target is immune to this move if it has the Sticky Hold Ability.
trick.shortDesc: User switches its held item with the target's.

crosschop.name: Cross Chop
crosschop.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

lightofruin.name: Light of Ruin
lightofruin.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

solarbeam.name: Solar Beam
solarbeam.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. Power is halved if the weather is Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, Sandstorm, or Snow and the user is not holding Utility Umbrella. If the user is holding a Power Herb or the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, the move completes in one turn. If the user is holding Utility Umbrella and the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, the move still requires a turn to charge.
solarbeam.shortDesc: Charges turn 1. Hits turn 2. No charge in sunlight.

hypervoice.name: Hyper Voice
hypervoice.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.

healbell.name: Heal Bell
healbell.desc: Every Pokemon in the user's party is cured of its non-volatile status condition. Active Pokemon with the Soundproof Ability are not cured, unless they are the user.
healbell.shortDesc: Cures the user's party of all status conditions.

destinybond.name: Destiny Bond
destinybond.desc: Until the user's next move, if an opposing Pokemon's attack knocks the user out, that Pokemon faints as well, unless the attack was Doom Desire or Future Sight. Fails if the user used this move successfully as its last move, disregarding moves used through the Dancer Ability.
destinybond.shortDesc: If an opponent knocks out the user, it also faints.

moonlight.name: Moonlight
moonlight.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP if Delta Stream or no weather conditions are in effect or if the user is holding Utility Umbrella, 2/3 of its maximum HP if the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, and 1/4 of its maximum HP if the weather is Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, Sandstorm, or Snow, all rounded half down.
moonlight.shortDesc: Heals the user by a weather-dependent amount.

filletaway.name: Fillet Away
filletaway.desc: Raises the user's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by 2 stages in exchange for the user losing 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down. Fails if the user would faint or if its Attack, Special Attack, and Speed stat stages would not change.
filletaway.shortDesc: +2 Attack, Sp. Atk, Speed for 1/2 user's max HP.

bellydrum.name: Belly Drum
bellydrum.desc: Raises the user's Attack by 12 stages in exchange for the user losing 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down. Fails if the user would faint or if its Attack stat stage is 6.
bellydrum.shortDesc: User loses 50% max HP. Maximizes Attack.

terastarstorm.name: Tera Starstorm

terastarstorm.shortDesc: Terapagos-Stellar: Stellar type, hits both foes.

bugbuzz.name: Bug Buzz

bugbuzz.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

bite.name: Bite
bite.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

nastyplot.desc: Raises the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
nastyplot.shortDesc: Raises the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

wish.name: Wish

wish.shortDesc: Next turn, 50% of the user's max HP is restored.

scaleshot.name: Scale Shot

If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.
scaleshot.shortDesc: Hits 2-5 times. User: -1 Def, +1 Spe after last hit.

protect.name: Protect
protect.desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Burning Bulwark, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
protect.shortDesc: Prevents moves from affecting the user this turn.

bloodmoon.name: Blood Moon
bloodmoon.desc: Cannot be selected the turn after it's used.
bloodmoon.shortDesc: Cannot be selected the turn after it's used.

mortalspin.name: Mortal Spin
mortalspin.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the effects of Leech Seed and binding moves end for the user, and all hazards are removed from the user's side of the field. Has a 100% chance to poison the target.
mortalspin.shortDesc: Poisons foes, frees user from hazards/bind/leech.

spikes.name: Spikes
spikes.desc: Sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, damaging each opposing Pokemon that switches in, unless it is a Flying-type Pokemon or has the Levitate Ability. Can be used up to three times before failing. Opponents lose 1/8 of their maximum HP with one layer, 1/6 of their maximum HP with two layers, and 1/4 of their maximum HP with three layers, all rounded down. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Defog successfully, or is hit by Defog.
spikes.shortDesc: Hurts grounded foes on switch-in. Max 3 layers.

revivalblessing.name: Revival Blessing
revivalblessing.desc: A fainted party member is selected and revived with 1/2 its max HP, rounded down. Fails if there are no fainted party members.
revivalblessing.shortDesc: Revives a fainted Pokemon to 50% HP.

uturn.name: U-turn
uturn.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the user switches out even if it is trapped and is replaced immediately by a selected party member. The user does not switch out if there are no unfainted party members, or if the target switched out using an Eject Button or through the effect of the Emergency Exit or Wimp Out Abilities.

photongeyser.desc: This move becomes a physical attack if the user's Attack is greater than its Special Attack, including stat stage changes. This move and its effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.
photongeyser.shortDesc: Physical if user's Atk > Sp. Atk. Ignores Abilities.

slackoff.shortDesc: Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.

zenheadbutt.shortDesc: 20% chance to make the target flinch.

revelationdance.name: Revelation Dance
revelationdance.desc: This move's type depends on the user's primary type. If the user's primary type is typeless, this move's type is the user's secondary type if it has one, otherwise the added type from Forest's Curse or Trick-or-Treat. This move is typeless if the user's type is typeless alone.
revelationdance.shortDesc: Type varies based on the user's primary type.

doubleedge.name: Double-Edge
doubleedge.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

victorydance.name: Victory Dance
victorydance.desc: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.
victorydance.shortDesc: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, Speed by 1.

beatup.name: Beat Up
beatup.desc: Hits one time for the user and one time for each unfainted Pokemon without a non-volatile status condition in the user's party. The power of each hit is equal to 5+(X/10), where X is each participating Pokemon's base Attack; each hit is considered to come from the user.
beatup.shortDesc: All healthy allies aid in damaging the target.

plasmafists.name: Plasma Fists
plasmafists.desc: If this move is successful, causes Normal-type moves to become Electric type this turn.
plasmafists.shortDesc: Normal moves become Electric type this turn.

boltbeak.name: Bolt Beak
boltbeak.desc: Power doubles if the user moves before the target.
boltbeak.shortDesc: Power doubles if user moves before the target.

stealthrock.name: Stealth Rock
stealthrock.desc: Sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, damaging each opposing Pokemon that switches in. Fails if the effect is already active on the opposing side. Foes lose 1/32, 1/16, 1/8, 1/4, or 1/2 of their maximum HP, rounded down, based on their weakness to the Rock type; 0.25x, 0.5x, neutral, 2x, or 4x, respectively. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Defog successfully, or is hit by Defog.
stealthrock.shortDesc: Hurts foes on switch-in. Factors Rock weakness.

hex.name: Hex
hex.desc: Power doubles if the target has a non-volatile status condition.
hex.shortDesc: Power doubles if the target has a status ailment.

rocktomb.name: Rock Tomb
rocktomb.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
rocktomb.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1.

psychocut.name: Psycho Cut
psychocut.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

seedflare.name: Seed Flare
seedflare.desc: Has a 40% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 2 stages.
seedflare.shortDesc: 40% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 2.

dragonenergy.name: Dragon Energy
dragonenergy.desc: Power is equal to (user's current HP * 150 / user's maximum HP), rounded down, but not less than 1.
dragonenergy.shortDesc: Less power as user's HP decreases. Hits foe(s).

tailglow.name: Tail Glow
tailglow.desc: Raises the user's Special Attack by 3 stages.
tailglow.shortDesc: Raises the user's Sp. Atk by 3.

bulkup.name: Bulk Up
bulkup.desc: Raises the user's Attack and Defense by 1 stage.
bulkup.shortDesc: Raises the user's Attack and Defense by 1.

mudshot.name: Mud Shot
mudshot.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
mudshot.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1.

meteorbeam.name: Meteor Beam
meteorbeam.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. Raises the user's Special Attack by 1 stage on the first turn. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
meteorbeam.shortDesc: Raises user's Sp. Atk by 1 on turn 1. Hits turn 2.

clangoroussoul.name: Clangorous Soul
clangoroussoul.desc: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage in exchange for the user losing 33% of its maximum HP, rounded down. Fails if the user would faint or if its Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed stat stages would not change.
clangoroussoul.shortDesc: User loses 33% of its max HP. +1 to all stats.

thunderfang.name: Thunder Fang
thunderfang.desc: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target and a 10% chance to make it flinch.
thunderfang.shortDesc: 10% chance to paralyze. 10% chance to flinch.

coil.name: Coil
coil.desc: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, and accuracy by 1 stage.
coil.shortDesc: Raises user's Attack, Defense, accuracy by 1.

endeavor.name: Endeavor
endeavor.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to (target's current HP - user's current HP). The target is unaffected if its current HP is less than or equal to the user's current HP.
endeavor.shortDesc: Lowers the target's HP to the user's HP.

shellsmash.name: Shell Smash
shellsmash.desc: Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage. Raises the user's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by 2 stages.
shellsmash.shortDesc: Lowers Def, SpD by 1; raises Atk, SpA, Spe by 2.

facade.name: Facade
facade.desc: Power doubles if the user is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned. The physical damage halving effect from the user's burn is ignored.
facade.shortDesc: Power doubles if user is burn/poison/paralyzed.

aquacutter.name: Aqua Cutter
aquacutter.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

reflect.name: Reflect
reflect.desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members take 0.5x damage from physical attacks, or 0.66x damage if in a Double Battle. Damage is not reduced further with Aurora Veil. Critical hits ignore this effect. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Brick Break, Psychic Fangs, or Defog. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Light Clay. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.
reflect.shortDesc: For 5 turns, physical damage to allies is halved.

chillyreception.name: Chilly Reception
chillyreception.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Snow. The user switches out even if it is trapped and is replaced immediately by a selected party member. The user does not switch out if there are no unfainted party members.

tailwhip.name: Tail Whip
tailwhip.desc: Lowers the target's Defense by 1 stage.

earthquake.name: Earthquake
earthquake.desc: Damage doubles if the target is using Dig.
earthquake.shortDesc: Hits adjacent Pokemon. Double damage on Dig.

technoblast.name: Techno Blast
technoblast.desc: This move's type depends on the user's held Drive.
technoblast.shortDesc: Type varies based on the held Drive.

shadowclaw.name: Shadow Claw
shadowclaw.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

spacialrend.name: Spacial Rend
spacialrend.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

toxic.name: Toxic
toxic.desc: Badly poisons the target. If a Poison-type Pokemon uses this move, the target cannot avoid the attack, even if the target is in the middle of a two-turn move.
toxic.shortDesc: Badly poisons the target. Poison types can't miss.

bodyslam.name: Body Slam
bodyslam.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.

mysticalfire.name: Mystical Fire
mysticalfire.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.
mysticalfire.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Sp. Atk by 1.

healingwish.name: Healing Wish
healingwish.desc: The user faints, and if the Pokemon brought out to replace it does not have full HP or has a non-volatile status condition, its HP is fully restored along with having any non-volatile status condition cured. The replacement is sent out at the end of the turn, and the healing happens before hazards take effect. This effect continues until a Pokemon that meets either of these conditions switches in at the user's position or gets swapped into the position with Ally Switch. Fails if the user is the last unfainted Pokemon in its party.
healingwish.shortDesc: User faints. Next hurt Pokemon is fully healed.

tachyoncutter.name: Tachyon Cutter
tachyoncutter.desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit. This move does not check accuracy.
tachyoncutter.shortDesc: Hits twice. This move does not check accuracy.

crunch.name: Crunch
crunch.desc: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
crunch.shortDesc: 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

pursuit.name: Pursuit
pursuit.desc: If an opposing Pokemon switches out this turn, this move hits that Pokemon before it leaves the field, even if it was not the original target. If the user moves after an opponent using Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch, but not Baton Pass, it will hit that opponent before it leaves the field. Power doubles and no accuracy check is done if the user hits an opponent switching out, and the user's turn is over; if an opponent faints from this, the replacement Pokemon does not become active until the end of the turn.
pursuit.shortDesc: If a foe is switching out, hits it at 2x power.

shoreup.name: Shore Up
shoreup.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half down. If the weather is Sandstorm, the user instead restores 2/3 of its maximum HP, rounded half down.
shoreup.shortDesc: User restores 1/2 its max HP; 2/3 in Sandstorm.

appleacid.name: Apple Acid
appleacid.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
appleacid.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

heatcrash.name: Heat Crash
heatcrash.desc: The power of this move depends on (user's weight / target's weight), rounded down. Power is equal to 120 if the result is 5 or more, 100 if 4, 80 if 3, 60 if 2, and 40 if 1 or less. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.
heatcrash.shortDesc: More power the heavier the user than the target.

muddywater.name: Muddy Water
muddywater.desc: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
muddywater.shortDesc: 30% chance to lower the foe(s) accuracy by 1.

memento.name: Memento
memento.desc: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by 2 stages. The user faints unless this move misses or there is no target. Fails entirely if this move hits a substitute, but does not fail if the target's stats cannot be changed.
memento.shortDesc: Lowers target's Attack, Sp. Atk by 2. User faints.

irontail.name: Iron Tail
irontail.desc: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
irontail.shortDesc: 30% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

drainpunch.name: Drain Punch
drainpunch.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
drainpunch.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

fusionbolt.name: Fusion Bolt
fusionbolt.desc: Power doubles if the last move used by any Pokemon this turn was Fusion Flare.
fusionbolt.shortDesc: Power doubles if used after Fusion Flare this turn.

defog.name: Defog
defog.desc: Lowers the target's evasiveness by 1 stage. If this move is successful and whether or not the target's evasiveness was affected, the effects of Reflect, Light Screen, Aurora Veil, Safeguard, Mist, Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Stealth Rock, and Sticky Web end for the target's side, and the effects of Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Stealth Rock, and Sticky Web end for the user's side. Ignores a target's substitute, although a substitute will still block the lowering of evasiveness. If there is a terrain active and this move is successful, the terrain will be cleared.
defog.shortDesc: -1 evasion; clears terrain and hazards on both sides.

surgingstrikes.name: Surging Strikes
surgingstrikes.desc: Hits three times. This move is always a critical hit unless the target is under the effect of Lucky Chant or has the Battle Armor or Shell Armor Abilities.
surgingstrikes.shortDesc: Always results in a critical hit. Hits 3 times.

flamecharge.name: Flame Charge
flamecharge.desc: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1 stage.
flamecharge.shortDesc: 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1.

doublekick.name: Double Kick
doublekick.desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.

megadrain.name: Mega Drain
megadrain.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
megadrain.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

recover.name: Recover
recover.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
recover.shortDesc: Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.

submission.name: Submission
submission.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

psychoboost.name: Psycho Boost
psychoboost.desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
psychoboost.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

encore.name: Encore
encore.desc: For its next 3 turns, the target is forced to repeat its last move used. If the affected move runs out of PP, the effect ends. Fails if the target is already under this effect, if it has not made a move, if the move has 0 PP, or if the move is Assist, Blazing Torque, Combat Torque, Copycat, Dynamax Cannon, Encore, Magical Torque, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Noxious Torque, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Struggle, Transform, or Wicked Torque.
encore.shortDesc: Target repeats its last move for its next 3 turns.

skyattack.name: Sky Attack
skyattack.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch and a higher chance for a critical hit. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
skyattack.shortDesc: Charges, then hits turn 2. 30% flinch. High crit.

direclaw.name: Dire Claw
direclaw.desc: Has a 50% chance to cause the target to either fall asleep, become poisoned, or become paralyzed.
direclaw.shortDesc: 50% chance to sleep, poison, or paralyze target.

sparklingaria.name: Sparkling Aria
sparklingaria.desc: If the user has not fainted, the target is cured of its burn.
sparklingaria.shortDesc: The target is cured of its burn.

eruption.name: Eruption
eruption.desc: Power is equal to (user's current HP * 150 / user's maximum HP), rounded down, but not less than 1.
eruption.shortDesc: Less power as user's HP decreases. Hits foe(s).

precipiceblades.name: Precipice Blades
precipiceblades.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.

aerialace.name: Aerial Ace
aerialace.desc: This move does not check accuracy.
aerialace.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.

matchagotcha.name: Matcha Gotcha
matchagotcha.desc: Has a 20% chance to burn the target. The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down. The target thaws out if it is frozen.
matchagotcha.shortDesc: 20% burn. Recovers 50% dmg dealt. Thaws foe(s).

roost.name: Roost
roost.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up. If the user is not Terastallized, until the end of the turn Flying-type users lose their Flying type and pure Flying-type users become Normal type. Does nothing if the user's HP is full.
roost.shortDesc: Heals 50% HP. Flying-type removed 'til turn ends.

wildcharge.name: Wild Charge
wildcharge.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

drainingkiss.name: Draining Kiss
drainingkiss.desc: The user recovers 3/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
drainingkiss.shortDesc: User recovers 75% of the damage dealt.

glaciate.name: Glaciate
glaciate.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
glaciate.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the foe(s) Speed by 1.

weatherball.name: Weather Ball
weatherball.desc: Power doubles if a weather condition other than Delta Stream is active, and this move's type changes to match. Ice type during Snow, Water type during Primordial Sea or Rain Dance, Rock type during Sandstorm, and Fire type during Desolate Land or Sunny Day. If the user is holding Utility Umbrella and uses Weather Ball during Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, Desolate Land, or Sunny Day, this move remains Normal type and does not double in power.
weatherball.shortDesc: Power doubles and type varies in each weather.

lightscreen.name: Light Screen
lightscreen.desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members take 0.5x damage from special attacks, or 0.66x damage if in a Double Battle. Damage is not reduced further with Aurora Veil. Critical hits ignore this effect. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Brick Break, Psychic Fangs, or Defog. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Light Clay. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.
lightscreen.shortDesc: For 5 turns, special damage to allies is halved.

headsmash.name: Head Smash
headsmash.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

workup.name: Work Up
workup.desc: Raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage.
workup.shortDesc: Raises the user's Attack and Sp. Atk by 1.

courtchange.name: Court Change
courtchange.desc: Switches the Mist, Light Screen, Reflect, Spikes, Safeguard, Tailwind, Toxic Spikes, Stealth Rock, Water Pledge, Fire Pledge, Grass Pledge, Sticky Web, Aurora Veil, G-Max Steelsurge, G-Max Cannonade, G-Max Vine Lash, and G-Max Wildfire effects from the user's side to the opposing side and vice versa.
courtchange.shortDesc: Swaps user's field effects with the opposing side.

copycat.name: Copycat
copycat.desc: The user uses the last move used by any Pokemon, including itself. Fails if no move has been used, or if the last move used was Assist, Baneful Bunker, Beak Blast, Behemoth Bash, Behemoth Blade, Belch, Bestow, Blazing Torque, Celebrate, Chatter, Circle Throw, Combat Torque, Copycat, Counter, Covet, Destiny Bond, Detect, Dragon Tail, Dynamax Cannon, Endure, Feint, Focus Punch, Follow Me, Helping Hand, Hold Hands, King's Shield, Magical Torque, Mat Block, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Noxious Torque, Protect, Rage Powder, Roar, Shell Trap, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Snatch, Spiky Shield, Spotlight, Struggle, Switcheroo, Tera Starstorm, Thief, Transform, Trick, Whirlwind, or Wicked Torque.
copycat.shortDesc: Uses the last move used in the battle.

noretreat.name: No Retreat
noretreat.desc: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage, but it becomes prevented from switching out. The user can still switch out if it uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the user leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. Fails if the user has already been prevented from switching by this effect.
noretreat.shortDesc: Raises all stats by 1 (not acc/eva). Traps user.

ancientpower.name: Ancient Power
ancientpower.desc: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.
ancientpower.shortDesc: 10% chance to raise all stats by 1 (not acc/eva).

tidyup.name: Tidy Up
tidyup.desc: Raises the user's Attack and Speed by 1 stage. Removes subtitutes from all active Pokemon and ends the effects of Spikes, Stealth Rock, Sticky Web, and Toxic Spikes for both sides.
tidyup.shortDesc: User +1 Atk, Spe. Clears all substitutes/hazards.

gigaimpact.name: Giga Impact
gigaimpact.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.

disable.name: Disable
disable.desc: For 4 turns, the target's last move used becomes disabled. Fails if one of the target's moves is already disabled, if the target has not made a move, if the target no longer knows the move, or if the move was a Max or G-Max Move.
disable.shortDesc: For 4 turns, disables the target's last move used.
